dct_title_s: Imperial chart of the world on Mercator's projection
dct_description_sm: Originally published on one sheet. Inset: Chart showing rain, winds, isothermal lines and ocean currents. W. & A. K. Johnston Ltd. operated as a limited company from 1901. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: Edinburgh : W. & A. K. Johnston Ltd., [1901 or later]
